itemLabel

Originally started by online artist & friend Mushbuh, itemLabel is a “revenge-based company” selling collectible toys, hoodies, bags, hats, T-shirts, etc.—all original.

I’ve secretly low-key done work for itemLabel here and there, but this time it’s in a big enough way to be worth an entry :p

“heaven shirt”, 2022

In October 2022, itemLabel released “Shirt Capsule 2”—a collection featuring 4 new T-shirts and 2 new water bottles, in collaboration with various talented artists and designers. If you want to see the other artists’ contributions, you can find them in the Twitter announcement!

My design is shown below. I was given total free reign, so long as it included itemLabel characters in some way. I imagined waking up in a meadow of blooming Sucklets, and watching the Bad Guy sun rise over the land. Where am I?!

“heaven shirt” is custom-manufactured, with a high quality 4-colour screenprint on the front. Buy yours here—if it’s still in stock, at least.

If you have one and wanna show it off, send pics to mel@nezu.world~ Or just mention me or itemLabel on Twitter, I guess.
